As a Product Manager, you would follow these steps to estimate the TAM, SAM, and SOM for Stiloni:

1. Define the market: Begin by defining the target market for Stiloni, which consists of consumers interested in using an AI-powered fashion image search app to find similar products and receive personalized outfit suggestions.
2. Estimate TAM (Total Addressable Market): TAM represents the total revenue opportunity for Stiloni if it captured 100% of the market. To calculate TAM, you can use one of the following methods:

a. Top-down approach: Research market size reports and industry data to find the total revenue generated by fashion e-commerce globally. Multiply this by the percentage of consumers likely to use an AI-powered fashion image search app to estimate the TAM.

b. Bottom-up approach: Calculate the average revenue Stiloni can generate from a single user by estimating the average in-app purchases, subscriptions, or advertisement revenue per user. Identify the total number of potential users globally and multiply it by the average revenue per user.
